import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faClock, faUserGroup, faBookmark, faCirclePlus, faCircleMinus, faCheck } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import classes from './MealDescription.module.css'; const clock = const user = const bookmark = const plus = const minus = const check = function MealDescription(){ return (

PIAZZA HUT AND MOREE AMSDLA ASLDN

{clock} 45 MINUTES

{user} 1 SERVING {minus}{plus}

{bookmark}

RECIPE INGREDIENTS

{/*

HOW TO COOK IT

*/}
); } export default MealDescription;
